body_html:
conda-build first verifies that the build seems to be working correctly, and then moves it from the temp-build folder to its final location, patchelfing a bunch of rpath/library names in the process to work with future packages that are not yet installed (but will be during conda-install). For conda packages, the artifacts are always broken until the very end.

So where are you getting this error? This is happening during ./scripts/build_anaconda.sh ? For which Anaconda and OS version?

body:
conda-build first verifies that the build seems to be working correctly, and then moves it from the temp-build folder to its final location, patchelfing a bunch of rpath/library names in the process to work with future packages that are not yet installed (but will be during conda-install). For conda packages, the artifacts are always broken until the very end.

So where are you getting this error? This is happening during ./scripts/build_anaconda.sh ? For which Anaconda and OS version?
